<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataMW extends data { const CODE = 'MW'; const PREFIX = 265; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '1\d{6}(?:\d{2})?|(?:[23]1|77|88|99)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:1[2-9]|21\d\d)\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '111\d{6}|(?:77|88|99)\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '31\d{7}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
